title: Ethereum Cat Herder Meeting #62
body:
## Date and Time

July 06, 2021, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A

## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. [ECH website](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/155) 
- Update

### 2. ECH Discord moderating & engagement
- moderating with bots
- new channels - Verification, open task, hackathon, discontinued product help

### 3.  ECH updates
- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 
  - Merge implementers' [meeting 7](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/348)
  - All Core Dev [meeting 116](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/346) 
  - Eth2 Implementers' meeting 67
  - EIP Improvement Process [meeting 36](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/pull/77) 
- ECH engineering 
- Cat blazers
- ECH Ops
- EIP/ERC editing
- ECH new initiatives
  - Stateless meetings 
  - Community partners at hackathon/events
- Anything else?

### 4. [Peep an EIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F) 
- [Altair client implementation (Teku)](https://youtu.be/Kv643dgRmMI) with Adrain Sutton 
- [Difficulty bomb & EIP-3554](https://youtu.be/QwCPrw-4d98) with James Hancock 

Upcoming
- A brief history of Ethereum's future with Benjamin Edgington on July 07, 2021, at 1830 UTC
- Follow more on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

### 5. ECH Blogs & survey
- [Ethereum blockchain users and developers research](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeugRHv93fizew0zeqXFOOnQIbjbWnVHoThLJR3f3g6gVvXhQ/viewform)

### 6. ECH funding
- Add new multisig signer
- Funding via Gitcoin, ESP & Moloch

### 7. Discuss and close the ECH GitHub Issues/PRs
- [ethereum-cat-herders/PM](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues)
- [ethereum-cat-herders/funding](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/funding/issues)

### 8. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- [Meeting 61](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/blob/master/All%20Ethereum%20Cat%20Herder%20Meetings/Meeting%20061.md)

#### The date for the next meeting - July 20, 2021
